    • 方法详细资料

      • connect

        public void connect()
        连接beacon
        connect to the beacon

      • connect

        public void connect(long timeOut)
        带超时的连接beacon
        connect to the beacon with time out
        参数:
        timeOut - 连接超时时间。如果超时没有连接成功，则回调 SensoroBeaconConnectionEx.BeaconConnectionCallback.onConnectedState(Beacon, int, int),其中state状态为 CONNECTED_TIME_OUT.
        connection time out.If connect to beacon over time, then callback SensoroBeaconConnectionEx.BeaconConnectionCallback.onConnectedState(Beacon, int, int),and the state is CONNECTED_TIME_OUT.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        断开beacon连接

      • closePassword

        public void closePassword()

      • checkPassword

        public void checkPassword(java.lang.String password)

        校验密码

        连接beacon成功之后调用该方法。如果beacon未加密，无需调用该方法即可对beacon进行设置；如果beacon已加密，需要先调用该方法，校验成功之后才能设置beacon，否则回调方法中会回调没有写入密码NOT_WRITE_PASSWORD。 若校验密码成功，回调函数SensoroBeaconConnectionEx.BeaconConnectionCallback.onCheckPassword(Beacon, int) 返回的状态为成功，否则为失败。
        check password
        参数:
        password -

      • setBaseSettings

        public void setBaseSettings(BaseSettings baseSetttings)
        修改beacon基础设置
        modify base settings of beacon
        参数:
        baseSetttings -

        proximityUuid -

        (格式:"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000")

        (format:"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000")

        (range:0~65535)

        (range:0~65535)
